name: Afghanistan
description: Landlocked country in South Asia. Known for its rugged terrain, rich history with various empires and significant archaeological sites.

name: Albania
description: Southeastern European country with extensive Adriatic coastline. Renowned for its medieval architecture, archaeological sites, and picturesque beaches.

name: Algeria
description: North Africa's largest country, bordering the Mediterranean. Rich in oil and gas, featuring Sahara desert landscapes and ancient ruins.

name: Andorra
description: Tiny, independent principality situated between France and Spain in the Pyrenees mountains. Known for ski resorts and a tax-haven status.

name: Angola
description: Located on the Southern Atlantic coast in Africa. Known for its oil reserves and diverse ecosystems, including savannas and rainforests.

name: Antigua and Barbuda
description: Caribbean island nation, known for reef-lined beaches, rainforests, and resorts. Historically significant with colonial history and sugarcane plantations.

name: Argentina
description: South America's second largest country, known for its diverse landscapes from mountains to plains, vibrant culture and rich history.

name: Armenia
description: Landlocked country in the South Caucasus region. Known for its ancient culture, religious sites, and dramatic mountain landscapes.

name: Australia
description: Largest country in Oceania, famous for its Sydney Opera House, Great Barrier Reef, vast desert wilderness, and unique wildlife.

name: Austria
description: Central European country known for its Alpine scenery, historical and cultural sites, classical music heritage and vibrant arts.

name: Azerbaijan
description: Country in the South Caucasus region, rich in natural resources, known for its blend of Eastern European and Western Asian cultures.

name: Bahamas
description: Archipelago in the Atlantic known for its hundreds of islands, clear waters, rich marine life, and vibrant tourist economy.

name: Bahrain
description: Small island country in the Persian Gulf, known for its financial sector, modern skyline, and archaeological heritage.

name: Bangladesh
description: South Asian country marked by lush greenery and many waterways. Its Padma (Ganges), Meghna, and Jamuna rivers support its agrarian culture.

name: Barbados
description: Eastern Caribbean island known for its beaches, botanical gardens, the Harrison's Cave formation, and rich history as a sugar colony.
